remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合會保存所有的子系指派給目前物件。The collection holds all the child objects assigned to the current . 您可以新增、 移除或複製; 當您這樣做，所有的子樹狀結構節點新增、 移除或複製。You can add, remove, or clone a ; when you do this, all child tree nodes are added, removed, or cloned. 每個可以包含其他集合物件。Each can contain a collection of other objects. 這可讓難以判斷在時逐一查看集合。This can make it difficult to determine where you are in the when iterating through the collection. 若要判斷您在樹狀結構中的位置，請使用屬性。To determine your location in a tree structure, use the property. 可以使用剖析字串字串值，以判斷 where標籤開始和結束。The string can be parsed using the string value to determine where a label begins and ends. 標籤設定藉由設定屬性明確。The label is set by setting the property explicitly. 替代方法是建立樹狀節點使用其中一種表示的字串參數的建構函式屬性。The alternative is to create the tree node using one of the constructors that has a string parameter that represents the property. 標籤會顯示旁映像，如果顯示的其中一個。The label is displayed next to the image, if one is displayed. 若要顯示的樹狀節點旁的映像，請指派來屬性之父代控制項，並指派藉由參考中的其索引值屬性。To display images next to the tree nodes, assign an to the property of the parent control and assign an by referencing its index value in the property. 設定的索引值的屬性您想要顯示當處於未選取狀態。Set the property to the index value of the you want to display when the is in an unselected state. 同樣地，設定的索引值的屬性您想要顯示當已選取。Likewise, set the property to the index value of the you want to display when the is selected. 選取特定的樹狀節點，然後逐一查看集合可藉由使用下列屬性值： ， ， ， ， ， 。Selecting specific tree nodes and iterating through the collection can be achieved by using the following property values: , , , , , . 指派傳回的其中一個先前提到的屬性，以屬性，以選取該樹狀結構節點控制項。Assign the returned by one of aforementioned properties to the property to select that tree node in the control. 可以展開樹狀節點，以顯示子樹狀節點的下一個層級。Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes. 使用者可以展開按下加號 （+） 按鈕旁，如果其中一個會顯示，或您可以展開藉由呼叫方法。The user can expand the by pressing the plus (+) button next to the , if one is displayed, or you can expand the by calling the method. 若要展開子樹狀結構節點中的所有層級集合中，呼叫方法。To expand all child tree node levels in the collection, call the method. 您可以摺疊子系藉由呼叫層級方法或使用者可以按減號 （-） 按鈕旁的，如果顯示的其中一個。You can collapse the child level by calling the method, or the user can press the minus (-) button next to the , if one is displayed. 您也可以呼叫方法來替代展開和摺疊狀態之間。You can also call the method to alternate the between the expanded and collapsed states. 樹狀節點，可以選擇顯示核取方塊。Tree nodes can optionally display a check box. 若要顯示核取方塊，將的屬性至`true`。To display the check boxes, set the property of the to `true`. 屬性設定為`true`為樹狀節點處於選取狀態。The property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示客戶資訊控制項。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根樹狀節點顯示客戶名稱，而子樹狀節點顯示指派給每位客戶的訂單數目。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此範例中，15 筆訂單會顯示 1,000 個客戶。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 重新繪製的使用隱藏並方法，並等候會顯示時建立和繪製物件。The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此範例中，您需要`Customer`物件，可保存集合`Order`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它也需要您已建立的執行個體控制。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型的案例，才能使用這個方法是呼叫上事件的或。A typical scenario to use this method is to call it on the event of a or . > [!NOTE] > 這個方法僅適用於的屬性設定為`true`。This method only works if the property of the is set to `true`. 如果設為`false`、 擲回例外狀況和樹狀節點將不會進入可編輯的狀態。If is set to `false`, an exception is thrown and the tree node will not be put into an editable state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者編輯非根樹狀節點使用。The following code example lets the user edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵滑鼠在的位置會決定，並儲存在名為的變數`mySelectedNode`。When the user right-clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果選取根樹狀節點，它會進入 「 編輯 」 狀態，允許使用者編輯節點標籤。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 當使用者停止編輯樹狀節點標籤之後，新的標籤文字會評估，並儲存。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 針對此範例中，數個字元會視為無效的標籤文字中。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果其中一個無效的字元是標籤，以字串或字串是空的使用者會收到通知的錯誤，標籤會傳回到其先前的內容。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何衍生型別可以指派給這個屬性。Any derived type can be assigned to this property. 如果您正在透過 Windows Form 設計工具設定這個屬性，就可以指派只有文字。If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. > [!CAUTION] > 方法會執行節點的淺層複本。The method performs a shallow copy of the node. 如果值屬性是參考型別，原始和複製的複本將會指向相同的單一執行個體的值。If the value of the property is a reference type, both the original and cloned copy will point to the same single instance of the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立將子樹狀節點的根樹狀節點。The following code example creates a root tree node to assign child tree nodes to. 每一個子樹狀節點`Customer`物件每個新增至根樹狀節點，以及子樹狀節點`Order`指派給物件`Customer`物件。A child tree node for each `Customer` object in an is added to the root tree node as well as a child tree node for each `Order` object assigned to the `Customer` object. `Customer`物件會指派給屬性，並表示樹狀節點`Customer`物件會顯示與文字。The `Customer` object is assigned to the property, and the tree nodes representing `Customer` objects are displayed with text. 此範例中，您需要`Customer`並`Order`物件定義，控制，和名為`customerArray`包含`Customer`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` and `Order` object defined, a control on a , and an named `customerArray` that contains `Customer` objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 最大字元數，可以顯示為 259。The maximum number of characters that a can display is 259. 如果具有超過 259 個字元指派給這個屬性，則會顯示只有第一次 259 個字元。If a that has more than 259 characters is assigned to this property, only the first 259 characters are displayed. 無法由使用者設定此屬性，如果屬性之父代設定為`false`。This property cannot be set by the user if the property of the parent is set to `false`. 明確地設定這個屬性的替代方案是使用其中一種建立樹狀節點表示的字串參數的建構函式屬性。The alternative to explicitly setting this property is to create the tree node by using one of the constructors that has a string parameter that represents the property. 標籤會顯示旁映像，如果顯示的其中一個。The label is displayed next to the image, if one is displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立將子樹狀節點的根樹狀節點。The following code example creates a root tree node to assign child tree nodes to. 每一個子樹狀節點`Customer`物件每個新增至根樹狀節點，以及子樹狀節點`Order`指派給物件`Customer`物件。A child tree node for each `Customer` object in an is added to the root tree node as well as a child tree node for each `Order` object assigned to the `Customer` object. `Customer`物件會指派給屬性，並表示樹狀節點`Customer`物件會顯示與文字。The `Customer` object is assigned to the property, and the tree nodes representing `Customer` objects are displayed with text. 此範例中，您需要`Customer`並`Order`物件定義，控制，和名為`customerArray`包含`Customer`物件。This example requires that you have a `Customer` and `Order` object defined, a control on a , and an named `customerArray` that contains `Customer` objects. summary.span: 切換樹狀節點為展開或收合的狀態。

span.span: Toggles the tree node to either the expanded or collapsed state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 樹狀節點已切換為相反其目前的狀態，請展開或摺疊的狀態。The tree node is toggled to the state opposite its current state, either expanded or collapsed. > [!NOTE] > 狀態會保存。The state of a is persisted. 例如，如果子節點的下一個層級未摺疊先前，當呼叫方法，子節點會出現在其先前的展開狀態。For example, if the next level of child nodes was not collapsed previously, when the method is called, the child nodes appear in their previously expanded state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例中移除當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下上方的滑鼠，並從切換至摺疊時展開使用者對它按一下滑鼠滾輪。The following code example removes a when the user right-clicks the mouse over it and toggles it from expanded to collapsed when the user clicks the mouse wheel over it. 此範例中，您需要與對它進行控制。This example requires that you have a with a control on it. 應該有兩個或多個根樹狀節點，各自擁有至少一個子節點。The should have two or more root tree nodes, each having at least one child node.
